mapper.select: select T1.F_ShipNo as fShipNo ,T1.IMONo as imoNo ,T1.ShipType as shipType ,T1.ShipyardCode as shipyardCode ,T9.ShipyardNameJP as shipyardNameJP ,T1.ShipNumber as shipNumber ,T1.ShipNameJP as shipNameJP ,T1.Series as series ,T1.ShipSpecies as shipSpecies ,T5.ShipSpeciesNameJP as shipSpeciesNameJP ,T1.ShipClass as shipClass ,T1.ShipNationality as shipNationality ,T6.CountryNameJP as countryNameJP ,T1.GrossTonnage as grossTonnage ,T1.BuildDate as buildDate ,T1.CustomerCode as customerCode ,T7.CustomerNameJP as customerNameJP ,T2.Status as status ,T2.ModelCode as modelCode ,T8.ModelNameJP as modelNameJP ,T3.IdentificationNameJP as identificationNameJP ,T2.IdentificationName as identificationName ,T4.MachineNum as machineNum ,T2.ShippingDate as shippingDate ,T2.EquipmentDate as equipmentDate ,T2.SalesJurisdict as salesJurisdict ,T2.ShipyardWarrantyDate as shipyardWarrantyDate ,T2.WarrantyDate as warrantyDate ,T2.Remarks as remarks from SHP_SPM_SC_Ship T1 left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Equipment T2 on T1.F_ShipNo = CAST(T2.EquipmentID AS varchar) left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Identification T3 on T2.IdentificationCode = T3.IdentificationCode left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Item T4 on T2.EquipmentID = T4.EquipmentID left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_ShipSpecies T5 on T1.ShipSpecies = T5.ShipSpecies left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Country T6 on T1.ShipNationality = T6.CountryCode left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Customer T7 on T1.ShipyardCode = T7.CustomerCode left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Model T8 on T2.ModelCode = T8.ModelCode left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Shipyard T9 on T1.ShipyardCode = T9.ShipyardCode
